name: Checkers - Russian Rules
description:
Train your brain playing Russian Checkers on the beautiful wooden board. Fight with your friends on a network at work or at home. Feel the power of artificial intelligence at different levels of difficulty and show yours!

FEATURES IN THE GAME

• Play against a computer.
• Play with a friend on the same device.
• Undo move in the single-player mode.

• Play on a local network.
• Play with friends in the Game Center.
• Text messaging on the network.

• Sweet sounds of knocking piece.
• Beautiful professional graphics.
• A little surprise if you win.

RULES IN THE GAME

Russian Checkers (Russkie Shashki) - jumping is mandatory and cannot be passed up to make a non-jumping move, kings fly across the board, men can jump backwards. More detailed description of the rules can be found in the information section (the round button in the main menu).
